unnormalised: Acknowledged, Mr. Sharma, but I believe the VP of Marketing's perspective, Ms. Kapoor, warrants consideration; perhaps a joint presentation with the CFO, Mr. Iyer, would be beneficial.
normalised: Acknowledged, Mister Sharma, but I believe the V-P of Marketing's perspective, Missus Kapoor, warrants consideration; perhaps a joint presentation with the C-F-O, Mister Iyer, would be beneficial.
